basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Roger Wells and Iâ€™m a software engineer. Before I was an engineer, I was a teacher. I have a background in Education, having worked as a high school teacher for about 10 years. I value excellence in my code. I want to find the best way to do what needs to be done, even if that means that I have to learn new technologies. I enjoy design and working in CSS and Javascript. But I am very interested in data analysis and the backend, having focused on Python as my stack. One of my strengths is good communication. I love people, talking to people, and working on teams. What I bring to the table is ownership. I believe that I should strive to do the best I can to deliver the results that I am responsible for, but I am also keen to go above and beyond whenever possible. I like to find opportunities to improve on my work and further develop my skills. The thing that most excites me in tech is machine learning. Being able to teach a computer to do something that we need to get done is exciting. The possibilities are vast. Hopefully, we don't accidentally create SkyNet.

projects.title: Animal Shelter
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
